name: CandyMan (Gökay Tacal, Myoniar, Mustafa Kemal Elma)
name_original: CandyMan (Gökay Tacal, Myoniar, Mustafa Kemal Elma)
description:
This game is heavily inspired by the Old Halloween Killers.  You play the sole survivor of the serial killer CandyMan.  In this weird factory, you need to run non-stop and try to escaped from CandyMan.  It is a Jam game and it's only a little demo and requires a download.  But test it out and please feel free to leave me a comment!

NEVER TOUCH THE CANDYMAN!

Developed by

Gökay Tacal

Mustafa Kemal Elma

Yağmur Öcal
